project_preview_description.text: Shipyard wraps Navio, a widget developed by John Guerra, to use it without writing code.

project_description.text: This project was developed under the supervision and help of John Alexis Guerra-GÃ³mez. He designed and developed Navio, a visualization widget to understand and navigate your data. Shipyard wraps Navio to use it without writing code. It was developed using ReactJS and Redux to handle state.
